metadata.Title: CVE-2021-30601 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Use after free in Extensions API in Google Chrome prior to 92.0.4515.159allowed an attacker who convinced a user to install a malicious extensionto potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
